Name: Steel lance
Description: It is very light and its steel tip does a lot of damage.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Es muy ligero y su punta de acero hace mucho daño.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 매우 가볍고 강철 팁이 많은 손상을줍니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Es ist sehr leicht und seine Stahlspitze fügt viel Schaden zu.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Il est très léger et sa pointe en acier fait beaucoup de dégâts.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Nagyon könnyű, acélcsúcsa pedig sokat károsít.
DescriptionLocalization.it: È molto leggero e la sua punta in acciaio fa molti danni.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: それは非常に軽く、その鋼の先端は多くのダメージを与えます。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: É bem leve e sua ponta de aço causa bastante dano.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Он очень легкий, а его стальной наконечник сильно повреждает.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Çok hafiftir ve çelik ucu çok fazla zarar verir.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 它非常轻，其钢尖会造成很大的损坏。
